mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xuesheng_id as xueshengId ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.liuyan_text as liuyanText ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.huifu_text as huifuText ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshizaixiao_types as laoshizaixiaoTypes ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail ,xuesheng.xuesheng_name as xueshengName ,xuesheng.xuesheng_phone as xueshengPhone ,xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number as xueshengIdNumber ,xuesheng.xuesheng_photo as xueshengPhoto ,xuesheng.xueshengzaixiao_types as xueshengzaixiaoTypes ,xuesheng.xuesheng_email as xueshengEmail
FROM xueshengliuyan a left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id left JOIN xuesheng xuesheng ON a.xuesheng_id = xuesheng.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.xuesheng_id = #{params.xueshengId} )
and ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} )
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.liuyanText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.huifu_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.huifuText},'%')
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.diqu_id = #{params.diquId}
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshizaixiao_types = #{params.laoshizaixiaoTypes}
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
and a.xuesheng_id IS NOT NULL
and xuesheng.diqu_id = #{params.diquId}
and xuesheng.xuesheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengName},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengPhone},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengIdNumber},'%')
and xuesheng.xueshengzaixiao_types = #{params.xueshengzaixiaoTypes}
and xuesheng.xuesheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
